description: Updates a member configuration with new parameters. Applies only to Hyperledger Fabric.

parameters.name: NetworkId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Managed Blockchain network to which the member belongs.

parameters.name: MemberId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the member.

parameters.name: LogPublishingConfiguration
parameters.description: Configuration properties for publishing to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. Fabric (dict) --- Configuration properties for logging events associated with a member of a Managed Blockchain network using the Hyperledger Fabric framework. CaLogs (dict) --- Configuration properties for logging events associated with a member's Certificate Authority (CA). CA logs help you determine when a member in your account joins the network, or when new peers register with a member CA. Cloudwatch (dict) --- Parameters for publishing logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. Enabled (boolean) --- Indicates whether logging is enabled.

nested_params.name: Fabric
nested_params.description: Configuration properties for logging events associated with a member of a Managed Blockchain network using the Hyperledger Fabric framework.

nested_params.name: CaLogs
nested_params.description: Configuration properties for logging events associated with a member's Certificate Authority (CA). CA logs help you determine when a member in your account joins the network, or when new peers register with a member CA.

nested_params.name: Cloudwatch
nested_params.description: Parameters for publishing logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.
